timeline.message: better message for exceptions thrown by github app webhook release
fewer log messages - throws get propagated to formatted log message

timeline.bodyText: Might be still worth a LOG.debug for when we're ... debugging
timeline.author: denis-yuen

replies.bodyText:
The messaged were being duplicated since they were printed here but also printed in AbstractWorkflowResource.java line 321.
Now they are only printed at line 321.
replies.author: agduncan94

replies.bodyText: They will be LOG.info though, not LOG.debug.
replies.author: agduncan94

timeline.author: denis-yuen

timeline.bodyText:
Ditto, in general think that while user error doesn't rise to the level of warn or error.
It can be useful while debugging
timeline.author: denis-yuen
